meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a fused tetracyclic ring structure.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study carbazoles to understand their unique ring structure.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician identified the carbazoles in the sample using advanced equipment.
meanings.sent3: The carbazoles at the science fair were so colorful, they looked like tiny rainbows.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, carbazoles stand out like majestic castles in a sea of compounds.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the carbazoles appeared like intricate puzzles waiting to be solved.

meanings.definition: Any compound containing a carbazole ring structure.
meanings.sent1: The chemist synthesized a new compound with carbazoles for her experiment.
meanings.sent2: Carbazoles are commonly found in various organic substances in nature.
meanings.sent3: At the chemistry party, the carbazoles were the life of the reaction!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a universe filled with twinkling carbazoles of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The garden of organic chemistry bloomed with vibrant carbazoles of discovery.
